message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm looking to save as much as I can.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $115? That's a significant discount from my initial offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm still a bit far from my target, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle if you're willing to come down further.
